messages.subject: Re: Digest Number 320
messages.msgSnippet: I know this is naggy, but I d like to remind everyone to cut out only the portion of the reply that applies directly to their message.  The daily digests get
messages.messageBody:
I know this is naggy, but I'd like to remind everyone to "cut out" only
the portion of the reply that applies directly to their message. The
daily digests get so large that juno won't let me read them, and then I'm
a day or two behind by the time one is small enough to get through. Some
of these replies are really rediculously long, including up to three or
four of the entire text of previous messages.

Thanks in advance,

Brooke in OK
